text: Wawasan 2020, or Vision 2020, was introduced by Malaysian Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad in 1991. The goal was for Malaysia to become a fully industrialized and self-sufficient nation by 2020. This plan aimed for 7% annual economic growth from 1990 to 2020, increasing the GDP from RM115 billion in 1990 to RM920 billion by 2020.Jeong Chun Hai @ Ibrahim, & Nor Fadzlina Nawi. (2007). Principles of Public Administration. Kuala Lumpur: Karisma Publications. Also see, Jeong Chun Hai. (2007). Fundamental of Development Administration. Selangor: Scholar Press. Also see, Mohamed Jawhar Hassan. (1995). 'Malaysia in 1994: Staying in Course.' Asian Survey, Vol.35, No.2, A Survey of Asia in 1994: Part II (Feb. 1995), 186â€“193. The Vision 2020 plan included three key phases: the National Development Policy (1991-2000), the National Vision Policy (2001-2010), and the New Economic Model (2011-2020) with the National Transformation Programme (NTP). == References == Category:Mahathir Mohamad
title: Wawasan 2020
